channel.title: Buffered writer reads integer?

item.title: Buffered writer reads integer?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

how would a i make a buffered writer read a integer instead of string?
trying to make a reader on stackables and un stackables

[code] public boolean whichType(String fileName, int whichStack) {
try {
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
new FileReader(fileName));
String data = null;

        while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) {
	switch(whichStack) {
	case 1:
            itemStackable[data] = true;
	break;

	case 2:
            itemStackable[data] = false;
	break;

	}
        }
    } catch (IOException e) {
        System.out.println("Critical error while checking banned");
        e.printStackTrace();
	return false;
    	}
}[/code]
